document.text:
From: 
To: "sam@samgregory.com" gam@samgregory.com>, Lloyd 
Epstein 
<lepstein@epsteinweil.com> 
Cc: 
Subject: U.S. v. Robert Adams, 20 Cr. 494 (PGG) -- Discovery Production 2 
Date: Sat, 14 Nov 2020 01:13:54 +0000 
Attachments: 2020.11.12_Adams_Discovery_LetternProduction_2.pdf 
Counsel, 
Please find attached a letter regarding the Government's second discovery production in this case. The materials are 
available on our secure file-sharing website, USAfx, and there is no password on the production itself. Please let us know if 
you have any questions. Thank you. 
Regards, 
Paralegal Specialist 
U.S. Attorney's Office I  SONY 
1 St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, 
NY 10007 
Office: 
Cell: 
EFTA00013372
